---
title: "Natural Gas dashboard"
output: flexdashboard::flex_dashboard
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.asp = 1/3) # It is a 2 column with 3 graphics and one table; the table is rendered for scrolling using DT::datatable()
load(url("https://github.com/robertwwalker/DADMStuff/raw/master/NaturalGas2019.RData"))
```

## Column 1

### Newspapers

```{r}
ggplot(Newspapers, aes(x=Price, fill=Location)) + geom_density(alpha=0.2)
```

### Experts

```{r}
ggplot(Experts, aes(x=Build, fill=Location)) + geom_bar()
```

### Forecast

```{r}
ggplot(Forecast, aes(x=Period, y=Forecast, color=Location)) + geom_line() + geom_point()
```
